post_text:
We’re hiring a Product Manager who loves building products that are simple, intuitive, and impactful. If solving real user problems, experimenting with data-driven ideas, and owning the journey end-to-end excites you — let’s talk.

📍 Gurgaon | Hybrid 

What we’re looking for:
✅ 4–8 years in Product Management (Fintech / BFSI / Consumer Tech = big plus)
 ✅ Strong understanding of funnels, onboarding & conversion optimization
 ✅ Experience across Web & Mobile App development
 ✅ Data-driven mindset (Mixpanel, GA, MoEngage, Amplitude, etc.)
 ✅ Hands-on with SQL, APIs, and product automation tools
 ✅ ONLY from Fintech / Investing, E-Commerce & B2C companies background. 

👉 Apply: rashmi@talentstack.in

Atif Khatri Dixit Hegde Shashank Shetty Sherwin Soman TalentStack - Your Global Talent Partner
